description: Explore a detailed comparison between Arbitrum and zk-Rollups, two prominent layer 2 blockchain solutions. Understand their key features, drawbacks, differences in security, transaction costs, throughput, ease of use, privacy, and speed of finality, to help decide which is suitable for specific use cases.
keywords: Arbitrum, zk-Rollups, blockchain technology, layer 2 solutions, Ethereum scaling, Optimistic Rollups, zero-knowledge proofs, transaction costs, scalability, privacy, security, throughput
title: Arbitrum vs. zk-Rollups: A Comprehensive Comparison
